name: Firefighter Simulator (yourlx, de1mossss)
description:
(WebGL doesn't support URP, so for full graphics experience download game, please)

Welcome to funny game about brave profession - firefighter!

The main objective is to extinguish all fire on the map.

Controls:
WASD - move
E - pickup items
G - drop items
F - spawn fire extinguisher (you should stay in front of fire truck, cooldown 5secs)
ESC - menu

Note: the fire extinguisher has a limited volume.

How to beat:
You need to extinguish all the fire on the map, preventing the burn to ashes of 25% of the objects. Good Luck! =)

Made for Jamulator 2021
by yourlx & De1mossss.
